message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
This is a fair deal for both of us, Alice. We can end this game and split the money now before inflation takes its toll.
Bob, inflation is hitting you hard! This is your last chance for a decent deal. Take it or leave with pennies!
Alice, this is my final offer.  I'm taking a significant hit from inflation, and this is the best I can do.  Let's end this game before we both lose even more.
